snippet: The districts, which were found to be illegally blocking enrollment of undocumented immigrant children, will stop requests to prove residency and train enrollment officials.
abstract: New York State attorney general's office orders 20 school districts to modify enrollment policies that have illegally blocked admission of undocumented immigrant children; joint review by office and the State Education Dept found broad pattern of intransigence despite repeated warnings,
lead_paragraph: The districts, which were found to be illegally blocking enrollment of undocumented immigrant children, will stop requests to prove residency and train enrollment officials.

headline.main: New York Compels 20 School Districts to Lower Barriers to Immigrants
headline.print_headline: State Compels 20 School Districts to Lower Barriers to Immigrants
